item.description:
The REEL Rock Film tour comes to New Haven and we all have a chance to go!  This doesn't happen every week around here.

If you're not familiar (or even if you are) check out the trailer here:

http://youtu.be/L35qBS7XqvI

Now that you want to go...RSVP and arrange carpools in the comments below.  

Tickets are $10 at the door ($5 w/ Yale ID) and proceeds go to benefit the local climbing organization The Ragged Mountain Foundation.

Enjoy an amazing film screening and support a great local cause that advocates on behalf of local climbers.

Questions?  Email nate@ascentclimbing.net
item.how_to_find_us: Park on surrounding streets - Follow Reel Rock signs to venue.
item.name: REEL Rock Film Tour | THIS Saturday in New Haven
